abstract: The influential proxy advisory firm I.S.S. took aim at Facebook’s corporate governance on Monday, notably the social networking titan’s dual-class share structure.
snippet: The influential proxy advisory firm I.S.S. took aim at Facebook’s corporate governance on Monday, notably the social networking titan’s dual-class share structure.
lead_paragraph: Not everyone likes Facebook’s proposed corporate governance plan. Add Institutional Shareholder Services to that list.

headline.main: I.S.S. Adds to Criticism of Facebook’s Governance

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
